## Hi, I'm Klemen Remec, a Developer from Slovenia

### About me

- I’m currently studying [Computer and Information Science at the University of Ljubljana](https://www.fri.uni-lj.si/en)
- My main focus is learning about new technologies and concepts of computer science in general through practical applications
